string.text: Found a stash.
Stash!
Found something!
What could be in there?
Hidden loot!
This could be a goldmine
Reminder to self 'cause I always forget:
Hey $c1_fname, guess what!
Today was a shitty day. Nothing unusual except for one thing.
Here’s something that might interest you.
Just a heads up.
I’ve got something interesting for you.
I found this stash while I was on my travels, but it wasn’t safe to open it.
I spotted some sort of backpack lying around. Not quite sure if someone put it there on purpose, but it was definitely hidden away.
I may have found an old stash. I spotted it while I was trying to get away from a pack of hungry dogs. It seems untouched.
I found a stash earlier today but didn’t have time to stop and check it out. Luckily it's well hidden.
There’s a stash hidden away over at $map. I haven’t had the chance to investigate yet.
I’ll give it another check when I get the chance. Something tells me that I’m going to get lucky this time.
Maybe someone was trying to hide their goodies?
Gotta check it out when I have spare time. I really hope no-one finds it before me.
I wonder what's in there...
Fingers crossed it’s not useless junk.
There’s definitely something in there. Let’s wait till things quieten down first.
Hope it’s full of expensive gear or artefacts.
I'm so sorry
Another one lost to the Zone
I buried our friend
He was a good Stalker
Another one bites the dust...
Bad news
$fname died
The Zone took $fname
I'm sorry to say that $fname just died.
$fname has gone back to the mud.
We just lost $fname.
$fname $lname didn't make it.
$fname $lname died today.
We'd just finished hunting and a boar came out of nowhere and gored him.
It was the usual route back to camp, we've taken it a thousand times… but he stepped in a Whirligig. It just pulled him straight into the air.
He took a bullet while we were out patrol. Took everyone off guard.
We were taking shelter from an emission and got swarmed by Tushkano. There wasn’t much room to get away from them, and $fname overwhelmed. The little bastards bit straight through his suit.
He was running away from a pack of dogs and they caught him just before we could scare them off.
Not sure what happened but when we found him...well...
We tried our best, but he bled to death while we were trying to staunch the wound.
His wounds were too great.
His body just couldn't handle it.
There was just too much trauma, too much blood.
We didn't have enough medical supplies...
He was just unlucky.
There was nothing we could do.
I'm so sorry.
He didn’t suffer for long.
He was a good Stalker.
We’ll open a bottle of vodka in memory of him tonight.
This might be useful...
Looks like a good passage.
Take a look at this route.
Found a new route
Secret path
Sup $fname, wanna hear something interesting?
Hello $fname, how are you doing these days?
Hey $fname, this is $c1_fname. I’ve got something for you.
Look who's wearing the daddy pants!
I am the greatest friend you've never had.
Hey $fname, this is $c1_fname. I’ve got something for you.
Well hello there $fname.
I got my hands on some old documents from $trader. They have details about a few locations around the Zone. Sounds like a bunch of researchers wrote this.
I met $c2_lname today and he knows about the situation. He showed me an easy passage to move safely between some areas around the Zone.
So I bought some info from $trader. The bastard wanted a lot of money for this.
I got some help from an old friend the other day. He used to be a guide in the early days but he’s taking things easy now.
One of the veterans showed me his map this morning. I managed to take some notes.
I found a Stalker who’d been caught in a blowout earlier. He tried to take shelter but it wasn’t enough. Anyway, while I was inspecting his PDA I found some useful information.
I was looting a body just now and I found a PDA with a few incredibly interesting entries.
Take a look at these routes between $map_route_1 and $map_route_2. Maybe one day you’ll need to use this.
Remember when we spent the night talking about how to get to $map_route_1 from $map_route_2? This will show you some good routes. You’re welcome!
I found a safer path after we tried that route the other day.
Here’s a path between $map_route_1 and $map_route_2. It used to be blocked by anomalies but it should be clear now.
Now I can't really promise that this is the safest way possible, but this is all I've got for now. I might ask around to see if someone can provide me with better sources.
All good? Let me know if you need something else. See you around.
If you plan to visit the place someday, let me know. Take care of yourself.
Be careful if you make the journey without me. You still owe me a drink from last time.
Good luck out there! Let me know if you find any new routes yourself.
Radio signals!
Any idea about this?
Caught an interesting radio signal.
Something is sending signals!
Noise on the radio
Hey man, it's $c1_fname again. Another boring day. We got another task from $leader so we had to stay at $rf_map for another day.
Hey $fname, this is $c1_fname. $trader wants another job done in $rf_map. So I'm sticking around this place for now.
$c1_fname speaking. I'm in $rf_map right now. My friend $c2_fname told me there are quite a lot of artefacts here, so here we are...

Remember this silly RF receiver you gave me? Not sure why you’d use such a thing when you got a PDA in your pocket. But funnily enough, I was messing around with it and suddenly the device started beeping and making noises!
It’s been a loooong day. I started messing around with the RF receiver that I was supposed to use for "emergency only". And then after a while I started hearing something...
I forgot to turn off the RF receiver I usually carry with me. The battery almost dried out, but once I got close to my destination, the device started making some loud noises...

And because I'm so damn lucky, my RF receiver and PDA almost got fried while I was passing through an Electro field. I can't believe I made it out alive! And my gear is still working too which is nice. And speaking of which, the receiver detected something...
Also the RF receiver was picking up some creepy noises earlier… Quite disturbing.
By the way, I heard those noises again on the RF receiver. It was the same as last time.
The RF receiver has been picking up some eerie noises lately.
It caught some sort of signal on $rf_freq GHz frequency, I think it's coming from somewhere around here.
Something in $rf_map is sending signals on $rf_freq GHz, and I feel it's close enough.
On frequency of $rf_freq GHz, the sound gets clear enough.
It's like some mutated creature is trying to communicate over the radio. You can sometimes hear it if you set the receiver to $rf_freq GHz.
If you tune your receiver to $rf_freq GHz you can hear what I mean. Whoever or whatever it is making those noises - They don’t sound pleasant or healthy.
I'm going to take a look around and follow this signal.
What do you think? I want to see what this is all about, let me know if you wanna join me on this one.
I need to see what this shit is about. Wish me luck.
We’ve decided we’re going to investigate these noises. Hopefully it’s just strange noises and nothing more.
We’re going to patrol the area and see if we can find the source of the noises. I’ll see you later.
Where's my stuff?
I know it was you.
Until next time.
You think that's funny?
Yo $fname, $c1_fname's here.
$fname you little bitch...
Hey
$fname, i knew it!
You took some of the diet sausages I was saving, didn't you?
Where are all the energy drinks from my backpack?! I know it was you, you scumbag!
You left and didn't say a word. It would have been fine, except you took 3 bottles of Vodka from me last night!
Next time your ass shows up here, you better have something good for me.
Better get me something in return. Keep that in mind next time you plan on showing your ugly face around here.
Don't think I’ll let this one pass.
I’ve had enough of your bullshit man! Come on!
Some fucking friend you are.
The $trader wants to see you by the way, so make sure to check what he wants.
$leader asked me about you. Guess you've got something serious to do, report back to him when you return.
Even $c2_fname has had enough of your bullshit. $mechanic on the other hand wants you for something important, go check that one out.
And which one of you idiots pissed in my sleeping bag?!
You owe me vodka and a pack of cigarettes. You idiot.
Someone put a bounty on your head!
You're being targeted!
Your friend died recently.
They’re coming after you!
Just trying to get your attention.
Just kiddin', don't get mad ok?
Baited!
Hook, line and sinker! Haha!
Ahhhahahahh! I’d love to see your face right now!
Can you bring $c2_fname and me some putinka on your way back?
$c2_fname says he wants a pack of Lucky Strike cigarettes. For me... Marlboro, don't worry I’ll pay you back.
Ok so I’m getting hungry. How about some diet sausages?
$c2_fname came back alive! He met up with us earlier, so we should celebrate tonight! Grab some vodka and food and we can party like it's 1986!
Anyway, can you grab some food? None of this Zone cooked shit though, unless it’s some boar chops.
We're almost done with today's shift, so see you in an hour.
I'll be waiting for you. Until then, don't get yourself killed.
Don’t come back empty handed or you’re dead to me. Again.
See you back at camp, Stalker!
Report
Target is close
Regarding the target
I'm in position
Ready and waiting
$leader, this is $fname $lname. I have a report regarding the mission.
$fname $lname speaking. I have information for $leader.
Name's $fname $lname. I received orders from $leader regarding an important target.
$fname $lname here.
I made it to $map and took position $directional $pointer. I have clear visual on the target.
The situation is calm at $map for now. The target is moving $directional $pointer. I will follow their tracks after a few minutes.
The area is surrounded by $enemy. They haven’t left their positions for quite a while now. It looks like they're working on something here.
I should also note that I spotted $enemy not far from here, but it shouldn't be any trouble. No clue if they have a connection yet.
I’ve spotted $enemy in the area. Tell the others to be careful if they’re heading this way.
$enemy have been sighted around these parts. They’ve been quite active in the area.
What're your orders?
Orders?
I will carry on with the mission and report any unusual movements.
That's all for the moment.
Has there been any change in plans?
Everything is normal
Calm day
Guarding this place
Send them this way
Holding this position
So far, so good
$leader, the situation in $map is the same as usual. Apart from some hungry blind dogs and tushkanos, there are no major threats. We got lucky enough.
We spotted $enemy $directional $pointer few hours ago, but then they got away. Since then, everything seems normal.
$fname speaking. Nothing new in $map so far. It’s been like this for a while.
$fname reporting in. $map is quiet...ish.
You can send $c1_fname's group over here, we will wait for them.
It's safe if $c1_fname's group want to head this way, we will keep an eye on anything that could happen.
I’ll wait for $c1_fname's group to take the next shift.
We’re ready for the next group to relieve us.
$fname out.
Until then, we’ll stand guard.
They better hurry before it gets too dark.
Tell them to get a move on.
Free meat
Going for hunt
Hunting trip
Wanna join us?
Hey $fname, are you still around $map?
$fname, you should come to see this!
We're about to start a hunting trip. You're missing out $fname.
We’re going hunting again if you want to join us?
$c2_fname spotted a group of Flesh $directional $pointer. They look healthy, plenty of meat on their bones. They haven't noticed us yet...
Me and $c2_fname saw two big wild boars $directional $pointer. Bigger than normal!
Flesh, a lot of Flesh, $directional $pointer. They're asleep now.
We saw a pack of boars settling down to sleep earlier.
$c2_fname wants to hunt them down. Free meat if you ask me.
You better get your ass over here. We can’t wait any longer or they’ll go and hide somewhere else.
I prepared my hunting knife, and $c2_fname is watching them closely.
We’re gonna wait for 10 minutes, so let me know if you get close and we can do it together.
So are you coming or what?
Inform the rest of the group that we’ll be late, ok?
Preparing for a raid
Freebies
We’re doing it
Preparing for an ambush
Going ahead with the raid
We’re having a party
$fname, what's up? We've got something for today!
$c1_fname's here, how you doin' $fname?
I heard you were looking for a job $fname?
I’ve got a job for you, $fname.
We spotted some rookies wandering $directional $pointer. Looks like they're lost.
There’s a few freebies wandering around $map. Right now, they're camping $directional $pointer.
We saw a group near $directional $pointer who’ve had a rough time.
I bet my ass those bastards have got full pockets. We should wait for the best moment to make our move.
I have a feeling that we’re going to get rich tonight...
Their backpacks seem full and heavy. We might get lucky this time.
They’ve got some good gear and they’ve been to some interesting places.
So, are you in or what?
We’re going to strike soon. Do you want to join us?
Tell $c2_fname that we’ll be late, don't make him wait for us.
I could use someone reliable like you. What do you say?
Bounty
I got something.
New job.
Available bounty
Hey $c1_fname, we’ve got something to do.
$fname, I got something for you.
Wake up $fname, prepare your rifle. We got a job.
Hey $fname. Grab some food and ammo.
I met $trader few minutes ago and he wants someone dead. The money is good this time.
$trader put a bounty on someone's head. 10,000 RU reward. This sounds good.
$leader was furious. He said that someone killed two of our guys and wants him put down. The reward is big so this must be serious.

So I was buying some ammo from $trader and I asked him if he had any jobs for me. He said that someone was interfering with his business and he wants to shut him down for good. Best part: he's offering a Jellyfish as a reward.
Name's $c2_fname $c2_lname. They were last seen wandering around in $map, $directional $pointer.

I asked a few people and they said our guy was seen moving around $map. $directional $pointer to be precise. His name is $c2_fname $c2_lname. And one of our sources mentioned that he travels with $enemy, so things might get tough.
$c2_fname $c2_lname is the target. He’s pissed off a lot of people lately so it shouldn’t be too hard to get information.
Let's meet there and check out the area. Let me know if you can get more info about him.
I say let's give it a shot before someone else takes the reward for themselves. Deal?
If you ask me, the reward is worthy. So how about we meet near the location and decide what to do next?
Get your gear ready and let’s track this bastard down!
We need to move fast.
Is it possible?
I’ve got my hands on an artefact
I found something interesting
I found an artefact!
Bagged an artefact!
Payday!
Shit, I found a Moonlight in $map. I'm so fucking lucky.
Woo! I just found a Bubble!
Almost got myself killed by all these Electros around, but it was worth it.
I soaked up a lot of radiation trying to grab this baby. It was bouncing around all over the ground.
Do you think $trader is interested in this?
Made it to the anomaly field
Abnormal anomaly!
This is weird...
Unusual anomalous activity.
Hello $c1_fname. I'm in $map right now, $directional $pointer.
$c1_fname, this is $fname. The research team has made it to $map, $directional $pointer.
Ok $c1_fname, I arrived at $map 15 minutes ago. According to the detector, the anomalous activity $directional $pointer is powerful.
As expected, the last emission made an impact on the anomalous fields in the area. My dosimeter is ticking quite a lot too, the radiation level is high here.
The area seems different. There are three new Vortex anomalies next to each other. The last psi-storm was indeed rough.
The anomalies have shifted and the readings have worsened.
Mutants seem to be avoiding this area, even though we’re out in the open and vulnerable. It’s very interesting behaviour...

I'm standing near one of the Vortexes here, and this one is abnormal compared to what we've seen before. The gravitational field is very strong, but the weirdest part is that it's not stationary! It shows some random movement, and the radius is expanding with time. But it seems that the gravitational field loses some of its power because of this behaviour.
Now the interesting part is this Whirligig. The gravity field is very strong near this one.
But what caught my eye the most is this Springboard anomaly. Unlike others, the radius is around 5 metres. It's massive!
Do you want me to take measurements of it?
How about I plant a few sensors around the field so you can see the readings yourself?
I’ll try and gather more readings and make more observations. I'll send the data over when I’m done.
